column9: These are alt lines that may not end in number values so that they still get subtitles.

column8: Do not despair and hold to your resolve, child. Tell me something; has the goddess Athena thus been true to her word, in her willingness to lend you her support?
Few tales are told of Hades, whose very name inspires fear and penitence, reminding us of the inevitable fate which we all share.
I, however, mean to tell you such a tale. Listen carefully...
Some of us more than others.
